title: ↪ 📱 2Bd 2.5Br Townhouse In Luxury The Crimson Condo 2/2.5 EDGEWATER: Close
posting_body: ['REF# 10R71', '$5000 · 1361 Sqft · Unfurnished · 2/2.5 · The Crimson Condo · Edgewater', 'Call ➟ Text ➟ WhatsApp', "📲 786'*'5O5'*'4314", 'Carlos Manchego', 'Goldstein Realty', 'show contact info', '2BD 2.5BR townhouse in luxury hot Edgewater District.', 'The comfortable living and dining room opens to a spacious kitchen with plenty of contemporary Italian cabinetry, quartz counter tops, stainless steel Bosch appliances.', 'Master bath with dual sinks and large shower.', 'A full size washer and dryer located upstairs.', 'Amenities include state of the Art Fitness Center, Yoga Room, Pool, Jacuzzi, Cyber Cafe, electric car charge station and Movie Theater.', '1 parking spaces.', 'Walking distance to Wynwood, Midtown, close to I95, Downtown and Brickell.', 'Youtube video with the address.', 'Read Less', 'REF# 10R71', 'tags:', 'wynwood lofts, 1010 brickell, paramount miami worldcenter, millennium tower, monarc at met 3, the sail at brickell, brickell city centre - condo north, brickell terrace condo, mutiny park, paramount miami worldcenter, onyx on the bay, canvas condo, grove towers, bristol tower, ion east edgewater, the plaza, elysee, hyde midtown, brickell on the river, parc lofts, groves edge condo, bay park towers, brickell city centre - rise, mint, costa bella, paraiso bay condo, cite condo, pelican reef, quantum on the bay, the crimson, biscayne 21, cynergi,, blue condo, brickell view condo', '_mr10']
